title: Show swipe Edit/Delete actions only after left-swipe in Folders, Notes, and Missions

requirements.text: Update the shared swipe-actions row UI so the Edit/Rename and Delete buttons are not visible by default and only become visible after the user swipes left far enough to reveal them; when the row is closed (no swipe), the action buttons must be fully hidden behind the row content and must not overlay it.

quotes: Η επιλογές διαγραφής και επεξεργασίας με swipe σε folders , notes και missions να εμφανίζονται μόνο μετά το swipe προς τα αριστερά και όχι απευθείας χωρίς να έχει γίνει swipe .

acceptanceCriteria: In Folders, Notes (mobile/coarse pointer), and Missions (mobile/coarse pointer), when a list row is initially rendered and not swiped, no Edit/Rename/Delete buttons are visible on screen.
After swiping a row to the left past the reveal threshold, the Edit/Rename and Delete buttons become visible for that row.
When the row is swiped back (or otherwise closed), the action buttons are no longer visible and do not overlay the content.
Tapping/clicking the row content when the row is closed behaves the same as before (e.g., select/open), with no accidental interaction with hidden action buttons.

requirements.text: Ensure the updated swipe-to-reveal behavior is consistently applied anywhere the shared SwipeActionsRow component is used (Folders list, Notes list on coarse pointer devices, Missions list on coarse pointer devices), without changing any backend behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: Folders list rows do not show swipe actions until a left swipe reveals them.
Notes list rows (on coarse pointer devices) do not show swipe actions until a left swipe reveals them.
Missions list rows (on coarse pointer devices) do not show swipe actions until a left swipe reveals them.
No backend API changes are introduced as part of this work.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (shadcn/ui components are read-only).
Do not change the backend canister interface or persistence; this is a frontend-only behavior fix.
nonGoals: Redesigning the folders/notes/missions screens beyond fixing swipe action visibility.
Adding new actions beyond the existing Edit/Rename and Delete actions.
Changing authentication, authorization, or any actor initialization logic.
